tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE pollutants (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  pollutant_name STRING,
  measurement_date DATE,
  measurement_time TIME,
  pollutant_level FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE location_data (
  location_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  location_name STRING,
  latitude FLOAT,
  longitude FLOAT,
  measurement_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE measurements (
  measurement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_id INT,
  pollutant_level_id INT,
  value FLOAT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (sensor_id) REFERENCES sensors(sensor_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (pollutant_level_id) REFERENCES pollutant_levels(id)
);

CREATE TABLE pollutant_levels (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    datetime TIMESTAMP,
    pollutant_name VARCHAR(50),
    pollutant_level FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE countries (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    country_name VARCHAR(50),
    continent VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE cities (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    city_name VARCHAR(50),
    country_id INT,
    timezone VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE measurements (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    city_id INT,
    pollutant_id INT,
    measurement_value FLOAT,
    measurement_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE pollutants (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    pollutant_name VARCHAR(50),
    pollutant_description TEXT
)
